type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike, reach
[i]Luna[/i] – Whenever Eirika, Lunar Princess attacks, her and another target creature you control get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
[i]Sacred Twins[/i] – As long as you control a creature named Ephraim, creatures you control have first strike.
Partner with Ephraim, Solar Prince [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Ephraim into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
